title: Early Access
content:
BG3 Early Access Impressions

Baldur's Gate 3 Early Access

How Big is BG3 Early Access Content?

Early Access for Baldur's Gate 3 is approximated to be twenty-five to thirty-five hours of content, filled with Quests, different Locations, and Act 1 of the game's story. Players are able to enjoy a full-fledged Character Creation System, a Real-time with Pause combat system, as well as multiple available playstyles in Classes and Subclasses. There are eight Races, most of which will have Subraces
